title: i cant log into my account
body: So i stopped playing over a year ago and i want to play again i try to log into my account but it says my username is incorrect, i know this is incorrect because its muscle memory for me at this point as i have had the account for upwards of 3 years, i also have friends who know the details and said its the same, the account was given to me from a mate when i first started and he doesnt remember the email address so i am at a bit of a loss, the name is maccasfr33wifi and i am even connected to it on my discord if that helps, asap help will be amazing thank you!

replies.body:
Ultimately, gifted accounts are at a huge disadvantage here. While it isn't typically punished, account sharing/gifting/transferring in any way is against the terms of service, and selling aside a large part of this comes down to account security. The fact that you mention multiple other people having access to the account is also going to dig that hole even deeper.

Player Support will more often than not need to verify original ownership of the account before they can restore access, and given you aren't the original owner, and are apparently one of many people with access to the account in some form, it is entirely possible they will not be able to help you.

With that disclaimer out of the way, support is still your best option. It's possible they may be able to help you simply reset the email, or failing that they may be able to restore the account to the friend who gave you the account, who can then give it back to you, but it will require him to remember details from it's creation.

Giving an account to a friend happens, but multiple people having access to an account gets real sketchy real fast, especially when you are missing key info. Don't get your hopes up too high.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
